author: Boone Ashworth
title: Mirror Review: An Expensive, but Fun, Way to Work Out at Home
description: This smart, space-efficient gym replacement might make you actually want to work out. Plus, it's shiny.
content:
Its hard to feel motivated to stay physically active during a long-term quarantine brought on by a global pandemic. You cant go to a gym. You can barely go outside. Sure, you could run a marathon on your balcony, should you choose the path of lunacy.
Back wh… [+9562 chars]
